entity.name: obs
entity.query: SELECT uuid, obs_id, person_id, concept_id, encounter_id, order_id, obs_datetime, location_id, obs_group_id, accession_number, value_group_id, value_boolean, value_coded, value_coded_name_id, value_drug, value_datetime, value_numeric, value_modifier, value_text, comments value_complex FROM openmrs.obs WHERE voided=0 LIMIT 10000
